name: Call of The Spirit Beasts.
description: As the Prince(ss) who was born weak, you do not share as many responsibilities as your older sister Aurelia. Until one day, you hear the call of the Spirit Beasts, calling for you to save them and the kingdom from the tyrant King. With the King's guard after you, you have no choice but to follow the call, and pray that it will be enough to save the land.
